text: Goodbye Flatland is a 2003 album by Canadian alternative rock band 54-40. ==Track listing== # "Ride" – 3:53 # "Animal in Pain" – 2:50 # "Take Me Out" – 4:01 # "Hope the Hell I Haven't Died" – 3:11 # "Not Enough to Make You Happy" – 3:33 # "Who is Sylvia" – 4:18 # "Broken Girl" – 4:16 # "Goodbye Flatland" – 3:26 # "Secret" – 4:31 # "Giants" – 3:40 # "Seventeen On" – 4:23 # "Wish I Knew" – 2:48 ==Production== * Howard Redekopp - Producer, Engineer * Warne Livesey - Mixer Category:2003 albums Category:54-40 albums
title: Goodbye Flatland
